title: How To Tell Your Cat About Trump
description: Are you upset about Trump? Do you have a cat? Then this book is for YOU.  Also for people who would have a cat but don't because of apartment rules or allergies, and people who don't like cats but dislike President Trump even more.  Contents: Introduction; Is Your Cat A Secret Trump Supporter?; My Bastard Cat Is A Fan Of Trump â€“ What Now?; Signs You Have A Nice Liberal Cat; Reassure Your Cat That Donald Trump Is Not Going To Grab It; Emphasize That None Of This Is Your Cat's Fault; My Cat Is A Persian - Should I be Worried?; What About Kitlers And Demonic Cats?
author: Breaking Burgh
